sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import * as Aos from 'aos'; import { FormService } from '../form.service'; import { Formulaire } from '../models/formulaire'; import { FormPortService } from '../form-port.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { @Input() personne: Formulaire[] = []; constructor( private formPort:FormPortService) { } ngOnInit() { Aos.init(); } }
About Me

{{personne[0]?.objectif }}.

Basic Information
Date of Birth:
{{personne[0]?.firstname }}
Email:
{{personne[0]?.email }}
Mobile No:
{{personne[0]?.phone }}
{{personne[0]?.adress }}
